               header=0, verbose=1, lowess=False,
               chart_format='png',max_rows_analyzed=150000,

source.9bc13ab9:
# we will split duration into two columns: seasons - first let's change all seasons into 13 episodes of 60 mins each (on average)
1. 1 season = 13 x 60 = 780 mins
1. 2 seasons = 2 x 13 x 60 = 1560 mins
1. 3 seasons = 3 x 13 x 60 = 2340 mins

source.ef96c23f: ## As you can see, AutoViz is a comprehensive EDA tool since it can now display wordclouds in addition to charts for tabular data. This makes it a simple but effective tool to do EDA on all your columns in your dataset. Hope you enjoy using this tool.

source.96e22bcb: ## let us see which countries have what kind of movies that are popular using AutoViz. Let us limit the number of countries to 5 so we can use that as the Target variable to visualize charts
source.2078c837:
### Observations and Insights from AutoViz Plots and Wordclouds
1. Duration of shows is very different for TV shows vs Movies. The US has the longest duration since it has the most TV shows.
1. India has the smallest duration since it watches mostly movies on Netflix.
1. US watches more movies and dramas while UK watches more British TV shows (no surprise!) while Korea watches Romantic and Comedies TV shows. 

There is so much more to add but I am sure you get the picture.
